## Front Matter
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


# Create some plot
```{r}
plot(cars, xlab="Speed in mph")
```

## Create new plot using ggplot
```{r}
ggplot(data=cars, mapping=aes(x=speed, y=dist)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE) +
  labs(x="Speed", y="Stopping Distance")
```
